title: Your Cute Family Live In Best Apartment-1 bed 1 bath Fully Furnished
posting_body: Extravagant Gated Entertainer’s Pool apartment on over an Acre Lot with Spectacular Views!
Private Unique Property is Truly One of a Kind!
Feels like you are at a Mountain Resort with Huge Park-Like Settings & Walking Trails around the perimeter of the property.
Kitchen includes granite counter tops and ceiling fans in most of the bedrooms.
2-Car Garage with finished storage area & pull-down stairs to upper storage.
Gated Home, Large Driveway and RV Access.
Visualize all the possibilities from Vineyard, Tasting Room, ADU, Weddings, or Events on this large Parcel of Land with Incredible Views!
Close to Award Winning Schools, Restaurants, Shopping and Easy Freeway Access.
Some portions of property may have been virtually staged.
